scripts.prestart: if  ls -1qA $PWD/server/data | grep -q .; then pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start; else pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data initdb; pg_ctl -D $PWD/server/data start; createdb; fi
scripts.start: trap "echo Shutting down database " SIGINT; $PWD/node_modules/.bin/nodemon $PWD/server/server.js; exit 0;
